text:
Any tiddler can be a project tiddler. This is the body text.

You can rearrange the position of the Tasks editor and the Tasks ViewWidget by clicking on the <<tag $:/tags/ViewTemplate>> and <<tag $:/tags/EditTemplate>> respectively and reordering the [[$:/plugins/adithyab/karya]]'s tiddler to the right positiong.
title: Demo Project
tasks:
[x] A task that has been completed
[?] A task in questionable status
[?] An unactionable task
[ ] Actionable task
[ ] Task for the futura
